pages.text: Choose a hard flat stone surface and place bales in straight-sided stacks, round bales should be placed on their ends.
Ropes are intangible, but climbable blocks, behaving in a similar manner to Vines and Ladders. Can be used to ring bells.
Of course you can untangle a safety net to gain the ropes. It just might take a while.
A safety net is used to protect you from injury after falling from heights by limiting the distance you fall.
